title: The Miracle of Rain
description: I thought we were doomed, so I said a quick prayer, and then I felt something grab my sleeve. 'Come. Come with me. My name is Smickett and I know of a safe place.' From hiding under the table to dancing in a storm party, join Nora and Molly as they learn that their greatest fears can turn out to be their biggest blessings in The Miracle of Rain.
author: Sherry Rossman
